metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14283 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 5.2.3, set_geometry in drivers/block/floppy.cdoes not validate the sect and head fields, as demonstrated by an integeroverflow and out-of-bounds read. It can be triggered by an unprivilegedlocal user when a floppy disk has been inserted. NOTE: QEMU creates thefloppy device by default.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
